♪I dreamed of starlight♪I dreamed of starlight pulling the sleeves♪
♪A white top♪A white top covering the thin shoulders♪
♪I have seen the wounds healed♪I have seen the wounds healed with each passing year♪
♪There will always be people♪There will always be people running towards eternity♪
♪Looking back all of a sudden♪Looking back all of a sudden under the dim light♪
♪I loved your eyes♪I loved your eyes looking at the starry sky♪
♪And I loved the universe in your heart♪
♪Time does not stop, remember the time♪Time does not stop, remember the time that we failed to treasure♪
♪The wind passes by the tall buildings♪The wind passes by the tall buildings with no one awaiting it♪
♪I've dreamed of traveling♪I've dreamed of traveling around the planet♪
♪Seeing the galaxy♪Seeing the galaxy pass through the clouds♪
♪I looked at the hills with sorrow♪
♪Will the exit of the dream lead♪Will the exit of the dream lead to the end of the starry sky?♪
♪Looking into the distance,♪Looking into the distance, which of the stars are your eyes?♪
♪It's out of reach,♪It's out of reach, so dazzling and hard to get♪
♪Time does not hold back, the spring♪Time does not hold back, the spring and autumn in the passing time♪
♪The wind sings the song of freedom♪The wind sings the song of freedom as I listen to the tenderness of time♪
